00040 ObjOaxConverterFrame::ObjOaxConverterFrame(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id)
00041 {

00043         Create(parent, id, wxT("OBJ importieren"), wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxCAPTION|wxSYSTEM_MENU|wxCLOSE_BOX|wxMINIMIZE_BOX|wxSTATIC_BORDER, wxT("ObjOaxConverter"));

00047

00168 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::setAllCategories(std::vector<wxString>* ptrCat)
00169 {
00170         // set standard category -> "Sonstiges"
00171         m_category = (wxT("Sonstiges"));
00172 
00173         // set standard category -> "Sonstiges"
00174         m_cbxCategory->SetValue(wxT("Sonstiges"));
00175 
00176         // create temporary iterator to extract all categories
00177         std::vector<wxString>::iterator it;
00178 
00179         // walk through all entrys and get category-name
00180         for (it = ptrCat->begin(); it != ptrCat->end(); it++)
00181         {
00182                 m_cbxCategory->AppendString(*it);
00183         }
00184 
00185         // append standard category, so it can be chosen again
00186         m_cbxCategory->AppendString(wxT("Sonstiges"));
00187 
00188         // we took ownership of ptrCat, so we need to delete it
00189         delete ptrCat;
00190 }
00191 
00192 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::setAssemblyData(AssemblyData* data)
00193 {
00194         m_assemblyData = data;
00195 }
00196 
00197 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::setData()
00198 {
00199         // set data
00200         m_width    = m_assemblyData->m_width;
00201         m_depth    = m_assemblyData->m_depth;
00202         m_height   = m_assemblyData->m_height;
00203         m_name     = m_assemblyData->m_name;
00204         m_category = m_assemblyData->m_category;
00205 
00206         // if a dimension is greater than SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE, rescale
00207         if (m_width > SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE || m_depth > SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE || m_height > SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE)
00208         {
00209                 // return max of dimenstions and get scale
00210                 double scale = (max(m_width, m_depth, m_height)) / SIZE_MAXIMUM_VALUE;
00211 
00212                 // divide by scale
00213                 m_width = (int)(m_width / scale);
00214                 m_depth = (int)(m_depth / scale);
00215                 m_height = (int)(m_height / scale);
00216         }
00217 
00218         // update frame
00219         updateFrame();
00220 }

00223 {
00224         return m_canvas;

00228 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::OnBtnCancel(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00229 {
00230         // disable modal
00231         MakeModal(false);
00232 
00233         // create event
00234         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00235 
00236         // set eventType
00237         gnrevent.setGNREventType(CANCELCONVERTION);
00238 
00239         // broadcast event
00240         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00241 }
00242 
00243 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::OnBtnCreate(wxCommandEvent& WXUNUSED(event))
00244 {
00245         // disable modal
00246         MakeModal(false);
00247 
00248         // prepare data -> store into struct
00249         // get objName and store into struct
00250         m_assemblyData->m_name = m_txcName->GetValue();
00251 
00252         // get category and store into struct
00253         m_assemblyData->m_category = m_cbxCategory->GetValue();
00254 
00255         // calc width-scale
00256         m_assemblyData->m_scaleWidth = (((m_width) / m_assemblyData->m_width));
00257 
00258         // calc y-scale
00259         m_assemblyData->m_scaleDepth = (((m_depth) / m_assemblyData->m_depth));
00260 
00261         // calc z-scale
00262         m_assemblyData->m_scaleHeight = (((m_height) / m_assemblyData->m_height));
00263 
00264         // get width and store into struct
00265         m_assemblyData->m_width = (m_spcWidth->GetValue());
00266 
00267         // get depth and store into struct
00268         m_assemblyData->m_depth = (m_spcDepth->GetValue());
00269 
00270         // get height and store into struct
00271         m_assemblyData->m_height = (m_spcHeight->GetValue());
00272 
00273         // create event
00274         NotifyEvent gnrevent(wxEVT_COMMAND_GNR_NOTIFY);
00275 
00276         // set eventType
00277         gnrevent.setGNREventType(OBJOAXCONVERSION);
00278 
00279         // set frameData pointer
00280         gnrevent.setAssemblyDataPointer(m_assemblyData);
00281 
00282         // broadcast event
00283         GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent(gnrevent);
00284 }

00300 
00301 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::OnSpcWidthChanged(wxSpinEvent& event)
00302 {
00303         // check if aspect ratio is enabled
00304         if (m_ckbProportion->GetValue())
00305         {
00306                 // get scale, calc actual value divide by m_assemblyData-value
00307                 m_scaleWidth = (double)event.GetInt() / m_assemblyData->m_width;
00308 
00309                 // set new m_width
00310                 m_width = event.GetInt();
00311 
00312                 // set new dimenstions with new scale
00313                 m_depth = (m_scaleWidth * m_assemblyData->m_depth);
00314                 m_height = (m_scaleWidth * m_assemblyData->m_height);
00315 
00316                 // update frame
00317                 updateFrame();
00318         }
00319         else
00320         {
00321                 // set new value
00322                 m_width = event.GetInt();
00323 
00324                 // update frame
00325                 updateFrame();
00326         }
00327 }
00328 
00329 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::OnSpcDepthChanged(wxSpinEvent& event)
00330 {
00331         // check if aspect ratio is enabled
00332         if (m_ckbProportion->GetValue())
00333         {
00334                 // get scale, calc actual value divide by m_assemblyData-value
00335                 m_scaleDepth = (float)event.GetInt() / m_assemblyData->m_depth;
00336 
00337                 // set new m_width
00338                 m_depth = event.GetInt();
00339 
00340                 // set new dimenstions with new scale
00341                 m_width = (int)(m_scaleDepth * m_assemblyData->m_width);
00342                 m_height = (int)(m_scaleDepth * m_assemblyData->m_height);
00343 
00344                 // update frame
00345                 updateFrame();
00346         }
00347         else
00348         {
00349                 // set new value
00350                 m_depth = event.GetInt();
00351 
00352                 // update frame
00353                 updateFrame();
00354         }
00355 }

00357 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::OnSpcHeightChanged(wxSpinEvent& event)
00358 {
00359         // check if aspect ratio is enabled
00360         if (m_ckbProportion->GetValue())
00361         {
00362                 // get scale, calc actual value divide by m_assemblyData-value
00363                 m_scaleHeight = (float)event.GetInt() / m_assemblyData->m_height;
00364 
00365                 // set new m_width
00366                 m_height = event.GetInt();
00367 
00368                 // set new dimenstions with new scale
00369                 m_width = (int)(m_scaleHeight * m_assemblyData->m_width);
00370                 m_depth = (int)(m_scaleHeight * m_assemblyData->m_depth);
00371 
00372                 // update frame
00373                 updateFrame();
00374         }
00375         else
00376         {
00377                 // set new value
00378                 m_height = event.GetInt();
00379 
00380                 // update frame
00381                 updateFrame();
00382         }

00397 void ObjOaxConverterFrame::updateFrame()
00398 {
00399         // update name
00400         m_txcName->SetValue(m_name);
00401 
00402         // update category
00403         m_cbxCategory->SetValue(m_category);
00404 
00405         // update width
00406         m_spcWidth->SetValue((int)m_width);
00407 
00408         // update depth
00409         m_spcDepth->SetValue((int)m_depth);
00410 
00411         // update height
00412         m_spcHeight->SetValue((int)m_height);
00413 }
00414 
00415 double ObjOaxConverterFrame::max(double width, double depth, double height)
00416 {
00417         double max = width;
00418 
00419         if (max < depth)
00420         {
00421                 max = depth;
00422         }
00423 
00424         if (max < height)
00425         {
00426                 max = height;
00427         }
00428 
00429         return max;
00430 }
